title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions: Indulge your senses with our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set! This set of 16 scented candles is the perfect gift for your Mother, Wife, Daughter, or Friend. Each candle is made from natural soy wax and infused with essential oils for a truly aromatic experience. With scents like Jasmine, Rose, and Vanilla, you can create a calming atmosphere anywhere you go. The tin can containers are not only recyclable but can also be repurposed as flowerpots or home decorations. Enjoy 18-20 hours of burn time per candle, but remember to keep them out of reach of children and pets when unattended. Treat yourself or a loved one to this luxurious set of scented candles today!
